regions.name: Tarragon (Corrupted Zone)
regions.blurb: A land twisted by corruption. Once fertile, now a source of dread.
regions.lore: Tarragon was once the breadbasket of the Enen Sea, but a creeping darkness has warped its fields and minds. Few dare enter.

regions.name: Aeyantis (Queen Ahris’ Realm)
regions.blurb: The shining capital, ruled by Queen Ahris.
regions.lore: Aeyantis is the heart of civilization, a beacon of hope and order. Queen Ahris’ wisdom is renowned across the realms.
